about_the_game:
Beating Heart Chest
Love is in the air in the world of Don’t Starve, and in this special Beating Heart Chest! Within this box you’ll find all three Valentine’s-themed skins, which can be used in-game in Don’t Starve Together. Spread the love!

Includes
  • Clement Life Amulet
  • Winged Brazier
  • Romantic Birdcage
  • Luxurious Stage Portrait
  • Resplendent Curtain Portrait
